section.title: What you can do on this page
section.p: The Filter history component lets you tell Mingle the exact project changes you want to see. It's split into two sections:

bullets.title: the top section lets you select:
bullets.item: whether you want to view only changes to specific project elements (cards, wiki pages or code revisions)

for cards, the specific properties they currently have or have acquired during the timeframe specified in the top History for: section (i.e. Today, Yesterday, Last 7 days, Last 30 days, In all history)
specific tags that cards or wiki pages currently have or have acquired during the selected timeframe

bullets.title: the bottom section you can use in conjunction with the top section or on its own. It lets you select:
bullets.item: specific changes made to card properties within the selected timeframe
specific tags that have been updated within the selected timeframe
cards, wiki pages or code revisions made by specific people within the selected timeframe
